UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Antimicrobial activity and membrane interaction mechanism of the antimicrobial peptides derived from Rana chensinensis with short sequences
Literature.Author: Shen M, Dong W, Qian J, Zou L

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli AS1.349(MIC=12.5µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa CGMCC 1.860(MIC=12.5µM),Klebsiella aerogenes CGMCC 1.876(MIC=>100µM),Enterobacter cloacae CGMCC 1.58(MIC=>100µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae subsp. pneumoniae CGMCC 1.176(MIC=>100µM),Staphylococcus aureus AS1.72(MIC=12.5µM),Bacillus cereus AS1.126(MIC=3.13µM),Lactococcus lactis AS1.1690(MIC=25µM),Enterococcus faecalis CGMCC 1.595(MIC=12.5µM),Enterococcus faecium CGMCC 1.2334(MIC=12.5µM)
